phrases: Did you wake up after finding something tasty to eat?
I was dreaming of Yoitsu.
My hometown.
Can I tell you how I truly feel?
Sure.
I am hungry.
Wolf and the Sudden Crack
What is it?
Hurry up and put it back under the blanket.
Do not treat my tail like a hand warmer.
With fur as fine as that, I could not match it even if I had a pile of top-grade pelts.
Ah, that is right.
I will give you a present in return.
Our next stop, Kumerson, is owned by the Furoania nobles, and there are a lot of heathens.
Religious symbols are banned.
It is an unspoken rule that even nuns and monks follow.
Everything works out well.
What?
You really though I had a present for you?
Do not underestimate my ears!
I was expecting more of a surprise.
Hey, hey!
This is payback!
Stop that!
I will not.
Are we still not at Kumerson?
We will arrive today, right?
Yeah, not long now.
Not long, right!
So the next meal I will be freed from hard bitter rye wheat bread and gruel made from it!
Yep.
And on top of that Kumerson is in the middle of a big town-wide festival.
I am sure there will be all sorts of food, so look forward to it.
I see, but...
Will your pocket be okay?
There is enough to buy you food.
But will not the inn be shabby because of that?
I intend to stay somewhere decent.
As long as you are not going to insist we each have our own fireplace or something.
I do not plan to be that picky.
But I do not want you to use buying food as an excuse.
Excuse?
We do not have enough money so we have to share one bed or something.
I do not want to hear that from someone who snores so noisily.
I do not snore!
Besides, you are not even my type.
Your ears can tell I am not lying, right?
Basically
Basically, you like me this way do not you?
Foolish men prefer weaker women right?
If I were the weak princess,
then you would have to be the mighty knight.
But what is it in reality?
Wait, you did act the knight once.
I did?
What, you have forgotten?
You know,
when we got caught up in the silver coins affair, in the sewers.
Oh, that?
Being a knight is not just about physical power.
That was the first time anyone had protected me.
Hey, stop that!
You will also treat me well from now on, will not you?
Sorry...
about what I said earlier.
I like that part of you.
Thanks...
Well, I do not mind if the room only has one bed,
but then there has to be two meals.
I got it.
There is good fish in that crowded place over there.
Why do not we buy some first-rate fish and have it cooked for us?
Some fish?
Yes, could you sell me a few?
I am terribly sorry.
All my fish have already been bought.
Pardon my rudeness, but might you be a traveling merchant?
Yes, I just came from Rubinhaigen.
In that case, if you follow that path for half a day, you will reach a lake.
The carp today is very good.
If you get a good deal you will be able to acquire a lot.
Oh, no,
I am just looking for a few for dinner.
You look like you have come up with a new business idea.
Ah, that was embarrassing.
If you are looking for fish for dinner tonight,
does that mean you are staying in Kumerson tonight?
Yes.
We are here for the grand winter fair and the festival.
The Radora festival is very popular.
Have you already booked an inn to stay at?
The festival starts the day after tomorrow right?
Do not tell me everywhere's already fully booked?
Exactly.
In that case I will try asking the trading firm.
You belong to a guild?
Pardon me, but which one?
The Rowen Trading Guild firm in Kumerson.
What a wonderful coincidence!
I also belong to the Rowen Trading Guild.
This must be God's guidance
Saying that is taboo in this area, huh.
It is alright.
I am also a believer from the south.
I am Fermi Amati.
For business, I go by Amati.
Craft Lawrence.
Likewise, I go by Lawrence.
This is my traveling companion, Horo.
We are journeying together for various reasons, but we are not married.
Is there something on my face?
Ah... no...
Is Horo-san...
She is a nun on a pilgrimage,
basically.
Well, I suppose problems in life are God's way of testing us,
as arranging for two rooms will be difficult.
You mean...
If I ask my business acquaintances to help out, they should be able to spare a room.
Are you sure that is okay?
Of course.
I would like you to enjoy plenty of good fish at trading partner's inn.
You look young but you have good business sense.
We will leave it in your hands.
I will arrange it.
Sorry for making you wait.
It is a nice spacious room.
I appreciate you introducing us to this place.
Do you like it?
But of course.
I am so glad we met you.
Ah... uh...
Um...
You are a really pretty and wonderful person.
You are too different from how you were earlier.
I just know how to act in different situations.
The wine and fish here are truly delicious.
That kid has quite good senses.
While being so young, too.
The amount he was dealing in was above average too.
Compared to that, the stuff you were selling...
What was that?
Nails.
I know they were nails!
I mean you should deal in more interesting goods.
Were you hit that bad from failing in Rubinhaigen?
Well it is plain, but it should yield relatively good profit.
And I am not just carrying boring things.
You are on the wagon too, right?
Huh?
You ordered another just a minute ago.
Well I guess that is about all you can handle.
It would not hurt to be a little nicer to me, would it?
If you are nice to men, they get carried away.
I cannot stand you expecting me to fall for the same flattery each time.
Understood, from now on I will...
Fool!
Men should be kind.
And if I act upset,
you will want to be kind to me, right?
This is quite a pale wine.
It called'burning wine'.
Hey, if you drink that much at once!
See, what did I say?
What a nostalgic flavor.
It is like the wine in Yoitsu.
I used to drink it a lot.
How nostalgic.
I wonder how everyone is doing.
I look forward to arriving at Yoitsu.
I can handle more!
Seriously...
Yoitsu's wine is the best after all.
So,
what happened to that Yoitsu village?
I see this face a lot.
I bought you some water and a bucket, just in case.
And about Radona festival.
The real events start tomorrow, so there is no need to be anxious.
Well, sleep there quietly for a while.
I am off to see a business associate.
Mark!
Re su pan dia milto.
Vant derji.
Pireji.
Bao.
Bao.
Bao.
Was I interrupting some business?
No,
he was just regaling me with tales of the god of Pitora mountain.
You saved me.
There is merit in being able to communicate using foreign languages.
Well, if I did not go around talking everyone into deals, Adelle would scold me.
So?
You came here to talk business, did not you?
Of course.
I have brought nails from Rubinhaigen.
Nails?
Hey, this is a wheat store you know.
But you get a lot of customers from the north right?
Nails are required goods to last through the long winter.
I guess there is a demand for them...
How many?
120 three-pattes,
Note: pattes are some form of measurement
200 four-pattes, 200 five-pattes.
I have got a letter of gauranteed quality from the Rubinhaigen Blacksmith's guild.
I will take them for 10 rumiones.
That is too cheap.
Have not you heard about the crash in battle equipment?
The Northern military expedition was canceled this year,
so swords and armor are being sold dirt cheap.
Because of that the market for nails has fallen too.
Even 10 rumiones might be too expensive.
That is only true for the southern regions, is not it?
It is true that raw materials availability has increased,
but melting metal into nails during the winter season would drive up the prices of firewood.
No one would be willing to incur the wrath of the townsfolk in doing that,
so the price of nails should not be affected.
Good grief.
Could you not have gone elsewhere to sell nails?
If it were wheat, I could find ways to bargain,
but nails are outside my field.
Then how about 16 rumiones?
Too expensive.
13 rumiones.
14 and two thirds.
Okay.
We will go with that.
That is my buddy.
So, payment in cash?
Or do you want credit?
Credit please.
Appeciated.
Everyone is charging cash this time of year.
The scarcity of cash makes it difficult.
Lanto!
Yes, master!
You have an apprentice?
It is natural when you set up a store.
Load all these boxes onto my cart.
I will be selling them at Hans' later.
That ironsmith person?
Just go move them!
Yes!
You will be here until the end of the festival right?
Come over at least once for a drink.
I will introduce you to Adelle.
Ah, sure.
What is wrong?
Are you taken in by my store's beauty?
Yeah...
It is a good store.
Oh come on.
Young people like you have much better ahead of them.
You are close to opening an even bigger store, are not you?
Cheers!
The festival is only a day away now.
So we have got pre-festival celebration to do tonight.
You are just using it as an excuse to drink.
I am really glad I met you.
If it would been anyone less serious but brainless, I am sure they would not have put up with me.
Hey now...
It feels like a long time ago since we first met.
That is true.
Back then, you were much more embarrassed at my temptations.
It was cute.
And you only drank half as much as you do now.
And you would not have answered back like that.
It is strange, is not it.
It is definitely strange.
Normally it would be much easier to get by in wolf form.
It is easier to chew meat,
and I still cannot get used to these cheeks.
But, you know...
I think I will be okay for a while like this.
You let down your guard when drinking in that form too.
You fool!
You fool!
There is a fool here!
You damned...
fool!
Come now, drink up.
Forgiven.
So, there is something I want to ask before you pass out.
What is that?
About possible clues that could help us find your hometown.
Clues?
There is not a predetermined path ahead of us, and we do not have a useful map.
Depending on the circumstances we might not be able to go straight there.
For example, do not you remember the name of any nearby towns?
That is it!
Niohira!
Niohira?!
Do you know it?
Yeah, it is famous for its hotsprings.
Even though it is full of heathens, I heard there are a lot of archbishops and royalty there.
Really?
Even these days?
The hotsprings were good for healing our wounds back then, so we went a lot.
So if this way was North and Niohira was here.
Where would Yoitsu be?
This way!
Southwest, huh?
How far?
It would take me two days.
For people it would take...
I do not know!
Two days, huh?
Two days at that speed would be quite a distance.
It would take me a month.
Do not worry about it.
I am fine as long as there is good food.
There is too wide an area to cover.
We cannot assume you took the roads as a wolf.
If things do not go well it could take a year or two.
This wine is delicious!
Are not you going to drink?
If we got to Niohira, would not you be able to go back alone?
Th-That is true.
I am sure I would be able to go back alone if we got to Niohira.
I will be fine.
Loneliness is a sickness that leads to death.
No!
I do not mean that, we still have traveling to do!
That will be enough.
You will take me as far as Niohira, right?
I still want to look around more towns.
Listen...
What I just said...
Earlier I said men are measured by their kindness.
But I do not want to be...
too pampered.
I am terrible, I am always thinking in our scale of things.
The time you age is like the time it takes us to blink.
A year of that short lifespan is precious.
I just... forget that.
That may be true, but...
How can I put it...
I will feel bad if you make faces like that.
Sorry.
I am the one who did not consider the obvious.
It is comfortable being by your side.
I just...
ended up depending on you.
Seems I am drunk.
I would better sleep soon, or who knows what I will come up with next.
Next episode: Wolf and the Calm Before the Storm.
Wolf and the Calm Before the Storm
